description.ko: 깊은 심연 속의 고요한 파수꾼이 무심한 위엄으로 별들의 탄생과 죽음을 지켜봅니다.
description.en: A silent sentinel in the deep abyss, watching the birth and death of stars with indifferent majesty.

prompt: A colossal eye-shaped nebula with a core of dense crystalline star-clusters, viewed through a thick veil of dark matter filaments and swirling gas clouds of deep violet and indigo. Cosmic scale with event horizon physics affecting the light of nearby pulsars. 8k, hyper-realistic, volumetric gas simulations. Detailed textures of stardust and celestial debris. Dramatic lighting comes from the radiant core, creating a sense of cosmic horror majesty and infinite depth. Raytraced light scattering through the nebulous gas creates a haunting, majestic atmosphere of the deep abyss.
